segments.text: I wonder if you can help me . I'm looking for a room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I've got a small room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 200 yuan a week , but smoking is not allowed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK.Can I see the room now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you mind waiting ? I'm on the telephone .
segments.speaker: S2
